Statute.Title: Federal Law and Civil Law of the Province of Quebec Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Droit fédéral et le droit civil de la province de Québec, Loi sur le)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2001, c. 4, Part 1 (ss. 2 to 7) in force 01.06.2001 see SI/2001‑71
CIF, 2005, c. 33, s. 9 in force on assent 20.07.2005
CIF, 2012, c. 31, s. 403 in force on assent 14.12.2012
